name: aqconnectCICD
helpMarkDown: Use this task to execute CI Jobs in ACCELQ
author: VivekBurman

inputs.name: appURL
inputs.label: ACCELQ App URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your ACCELQ Application URL in the exact following format: https://<hostname>:<port_num>

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key available in Profile section of ACCELQ

inputs.name: tenantCode
inputs.label: Tenant Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tenant Code displayed in the Profile section of ACCELQ

inputs.name: jobId
inputs.label: ACCELQ CI Job ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: This ID should come from the CI job you saved in ACCELQ application

inputs.name: runParam
inputs.label: Run Parameters (optional)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run Params(optional) should be JSON string form example: {"username": "John Todd", "password": "bxW&=UVw"}

inputs.name: stepFailureThreshold
inputs.label: Step Failure threshold (optional)
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Percentage ACCELQ test case failure, beyond which this Step in the Pipeline will be marked as a failure. If this is zero, even a single failed test will cause the Step to fail. If you never want to fail the Pipeline Step due to failing Automation tests, input -1.
Input a valid integer between 0 and 100 or, -1.
